listData.name: Total Home Loan Package
listData.description: With our Total Home Loan Package, you could pay less fees and lower interest. You can also switch from variable to fixed at any time, and even split your loan between both different rate types at no cost.

features.additionalValue: Low Rate Credit Card Annual Fee Waived
features.additionalInfo: Total Home Loan Package includes Annual Fee waived on the Low Rate Credit Card.
Access your money 24/7 through Internet Banking, Telephone Banking or Mobile Banking services.
Offset optional:  Multiple Offset Accounts can be linked to a Variable Loan.  The balance in this account reduces the interest you pay on your mortgage.
Pre-Approval: 120 day pre-approval so you can search with confidence.
Additional Repayments: make unlimited additional repayments to your loan when on a variable interest rate; or make up to $25,000 p.a. in additional repayments to your loan when in a fixed rate.

Available as a Building Loan: Building Loan can be customised to suit your needs and comes with structured progress payments which ensure you only pay interest on the funds you need.  Terms and conditions and other eligibility requirements apply.

Available for Parent Equity: With our Parent Equity option, a parent can guarantee part of your loan to alleviate the need for a deposit from you, usually around 20% of your total loan amount.  Terms and conditions and other eligibility requirements apply
Split Loan: A split loan gives you the stability of a fixed interest rate plus the flexibility of a variable interest rate.

Land Rent Scheme Loan (ACT only): The ACT Government's Land Rent Scheme is a more affordable way to own your own home. That's because you're buying or building your home on land that's rented from the government, so you only need a loan just for the building. This makes it way cheaper and faster to own your own home. But it's only available in the ACT and eligibility criteria and government approval are required.

Available as a Bridging Loan: This type of loan allows you to purchase your new property without selling your existing property first. Usually a short term loan with interest only repayments.  Terms and conditions and other eligibility requirements apply.
Redraw payments made in advance at any time through Internet and Mobile Banking.  Minimum redraw amount is $500.

listData.name: CBB SPC
listData.description: A salary packaging card (living expenses card) allows an individual to use pre-tax income for purchases associated with everyday living such as groceries, clothes, fuel or pay for expenses like utility bills.

features.additionalInfo: You can use your 16 digit card number to make visa payments for your utility bills.
Visa Card available.
Access your account 24/7 through Internet Banking, Telephone Banking or Mobile Banking services.
Load your Beyond Bank card to your phone to make fast and easy transactions.
Available with Internet Banking or via notifications from Mobile Banking. Service enables information about accounts to be sent via SMS, email or push alerts. It is event triggered or on demand.
Fringe benefit tax class ruling: The card complies with fringe benefits tax Class Ruling approved and published by the ATO (CR 2016/18)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Need to be employed by an eligible employer.

Availability: The card is only available to employees who work for an eligible employer under Sections 57A and 65J of the Fringe Benefits Tax Assessment Act 1986. These sections grant eligibility to the following employer organisations - Public Benevolent Institutions (charities, etc), Hospitals, Nursing Homes, Government Departments, etc, Rebatable Non-for-Profit Organisations.
Account credits and debits: Only the salary packaging provider/employer can credit the account with pre-tax funds. Cash withdrawals, transfers, direct debits and Bpay payments are not permitted.
Membership: You must be or become a Beyond Bank Australia member
